title: My easy vegetable curry
ingredients: ['28g (1oz) butter', '2 sticks celery, chopped', '2 carrots, chopped', '1/2 red or green pepper, chopped', '1/2 onion, chopped', '1/2 turnip, chopped', '1/2 cauliflower, broken into florets', '1 garlic clove, crushed', '1 red chilli, chopped', '1 green chilli, chopped', '1 handful button mushrooms, chopped', '1/2 bunch broccoli, broken into florets', '1/2 teaspoon curry powder', '600ml (1pt) water', '1 tablespoon tomato paste', '1 tablespoon chopped tomatoes', '1 handful freshly cut coriander', '56g (2oz) plain flour', '1 handful baby spinach']
